languages.text: "Господин Версериан временами может производить впечатление ворчливого старика, да простит глубокоуважаемый офицер мне эти слова. Но я достаточно неплохо познакомился и с его, и с вашим характером, из чего могу заключить, что его попытки наставлять вас имеют причину для существования".

traits.locale_text: "Господин Версериан временами может производить впечатление ворчливого старика, да простит глубокоуважаемый офицер мне эти слова. Но я достаточно неплохо познакомился и с его, и с вашим характером, из чего могу заключить, что его попытки наставлять вас имеют причину для существования".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."
languages.original_text: "Господин Версериан временами может производить впечатление ворчливого старика, да простит глубокоуважаемый офицер мне эти слова. Но я достаточно неплохо познакомился и с его, и с вашим характером, из чего могу заключить, что его попытки наставлять вас имеют причину для существования".

traits.locale_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “韦尔森大师有时候就像个脾气暴躁的老爷子一样，希望他能原谅我这么说。不过现在，我对他和对你都有了足够的了解，因此我认为，他想要提出建议的心情是不无道理的。”
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森大师有时候就像个脾气暴躁的老爷子一样，希望他能原谅我这么说。不过现在，我对他和对你都有了足够的了解，因此我认为，他想要提出建议的心情是不无道理的。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «El maestro Werserian puede, en ocasiones, comportarse como un viejo gruñón, con perdón del venerable oficial. Pero voy conociendo tanto su carácter como el de usted y puedo concluir que sus intentos de guiarle están plenamente justificados».
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro Werserian puede, en ocasiones, comportarse como un viejo gruñón, con perdón del venerable oficial. Pero voy conociendo tanto su carácter como el de usted y puedo concluir que sus intentos de guiarle están plenamente justificados».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「マスター・ウェルザリアンは、時に不機嫌な老人に見えることがある…尊敬すべき士官にそのように言ってもいいかはわからないがな。しかし、俺は彼の性格も、あなたのこともよくわかった。彼の指導の試みが適切なものであることはわかっている」
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ウェルザリアンは、時に不機嫌な老人に見えることがある…尊敬すべき士官にそのように言ってもいいかはわからないがな。しかし、俺は彼の性格も、あなたのこともよくわかった。彼の指導の試みが適切なものであることはわかっている」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Maître Werserian se comporte parfois comme un vieux grincheux, si vous me pardonnez l'expression. Mais maintenant que je connais mieux son caractère et le vôtre, je peux en conclure que les conseils qu'il tente de vous donner ne sont pas injustifiés. »
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Werserian se comporte parfois comme un vieux grincheux, si vous me pardonnez l'expression. Mais maintenant que je connais mieux son caractère et le vôtre, je peux en conclure que les conseils qu'il tente de vous donner ne sont pas injustifiés. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Mit Verlaub, geehrter Offizier, Meister Werserian wirkt ab und zu wie ein kauziger alter Mann. Aber ich kenne seinen Charakter, und Euren, inzwischen gut genug, um zu wissen, dass seine Hilfestellung Hand und Fuß hat."
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Verlaub, geehrter Offizier, Meister Werserian wirkt ab und zu wie ein kauziger alter Mann. Aber ich kenne seinen Charakter, und Euren, inzwischen gut genug, um zu wissen, dass seine Hilfestellung Hand und Fuß hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Üstat Werserian, arada sırada aksi bir ihtiyar gibi görünebilir. Bunu söylediğim için saygıdeğer subayımızın affına sığınıyorum. Ancak her ikinizi de kendisinin rehberlik sağlama çabalarının gerekli olduğu kanaatine varacak kadar tanıdım."
languages.original_text: "Master Werserian can at times come across as a grumpy old man — if the esteemed officer will forgive me for saying so. But I have come to know his character, and yours, well enough now to conclude that his attempts to provide guidance are warranted."
